platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:197:apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:200:  name: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:202:    cert-manager.io/inject-ca-from: default/cosign-webhook-cert
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:204:  - name: cosign.superai.io
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:212:        name: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:216:    admissionReviewVersions: ["v1"]
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:223:  name: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:230:    app: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:235:  name: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:241:      app: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:245:        app: cosign-webhook
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:249:        image: gcr.io/projectsigstore/cosign:v2.2.1
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:253:          - --public-key=/etc/cosign/cosign.pub
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:260:          mountPath: /etc/cosign
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:264:        secret:
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:265:          secretName: cosign-public-key
platforms/eco-superai/platform-superai/scripts/image-signing.sh:270:  name: cosign-public-key
